articles.title: South End residents say they picked up 180 needles in less than a week at neighborhood park
articles.description:
Just days after a public safety meeting at Cathedral High School, the community shared an "SOS" message created with the discarded needles.

The post South End residents say they picked up 180 needles in less than a week at neighborhood park appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Residents collected 180 discarded needles in less than a week at a South End park.
Community members created an 'SOS' message using the needles to raise awareness.
Public safety concerns heightened following a recent meeting at Cathedral High School.

articles.title: What Kevin Durant said about Jayson Tatum’s Achilles recovery, chances of returning this year
articles.description:
"I’m sure if he can get out there no matter what the team’s record is, no matter what, he’s going to get out there to play."

The post What Kevin Durant said about Jayson Tatum’s Achilles recovery, chances of returning this year appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Kevin Durant expressed confidence in Jayson Tatum's return from Achilles injury this season.
Tatum is determined to play regardless of the Boston Celtics' current record.
His return could significantly influence the Celtics' performance in the ongoing NBA season.

articles.title: Amid tragedy, childhood friends DeMario Douglas and Terrell Jennings persevere in Patriots’ win
articles.description:
“He was here with me today. First day in heaven — he was working.”

The post Amid tragedy, childhood friends DeMario Douglas and Terrell Jennings persevere in Patriots’ win appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: DeMario Douglas and Terrell Jennings contributed to the Patriots' recent victory amid personal tragedy.
Douglas dedicated the win to his late friend, marking a poignant moment for the team.
This victory resonates with Boston fans, highlighting resilience in the face of loss.

articles.title: Mike Vrabel shares message to Patriots, Drake Maye after nail-biting win over Falcons
articles.description:
"Don't let anybody take the joy of what we do. Joy is authentic."

The post Mike Vrabel shares message to Patriots, Drake Maye after nail-biting win over Falcons appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel emphasized joy in sports after Patriots' close win over Falcons on November 2.
Drake Maye contributed significantly to the Patriots' victory, showcasing his potential as a rookie.
The win boosts local morale and keeps Patriots' playoff hopes alive for Boston fans.

articles.title: Former Newton Mayor Setti Warren dies ‘unexpectedly’ at 55
articles.description:
"I am shocked. And I have called his phone and texted him repeatedly upon learning this devastating news as it was easier to be in denial,” Representative Ayanna Pressley wrote on social media.

The post Former Newton Mayor Setti Warren dies ‘unexpectedly’ at 55 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Former Newton Mayor Setti Warren passed away unexpectedly at age 55.
Representative Ayanna Pressley expressed shock and denial over Warren's death on social media.
Warren's death leaves a significant void in local leadership and community engagement.
